sentences.sContent: Beautiful butterflies hovered above the wild flowers.
sentences.sCn: 美丽的蝴蝶在野花上方盘旋。

trans.tranCn: 徘徊， 彷徨； 翱翔， 盘旋
trans.tranOther: To hover means to stay in the same position in the air without moving forward or backward. Many birds and insects can hover by moving their wings very quickly.
